alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL LACLEDE COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lebanon, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bennett Spring State Park and Phillipsburg. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 117 and 119, and between mile markers 121 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
